content: trim for neck trim us 9/5 5 mm 16 /40 cm circ or 1 needle size smaller than that used to obtain gauge tips stitch markers in variety of colors for tips to help make your own mud season visit stitch holders or scrap yarn elizabethsmithknits com/mudseason-tips tapestry needle www elizabethsmithknits com 1 row 3 - raglan & neck increase row rs kfb *k to instructions 1 st before marker kfb sm kfb repeat from * 3 more times then k to 2 sts before end kfb k1 - 2 sts increase d each front sleeve and back raglan section 1 row 4 ws p to end slipping markers as you with us 10/6 mm 24 /60 cm circ and long tail co reach them method co 34 34 34 38 38 38 42 42 44 44 sts do not join in the round repeat row 3-4 2 more times row 1 - raglan set-up row ws p1 for front total sts pm p 4 4 4 5 5 5 6 6 6 6 for sleeve pm each front 11 p 24 24 24 26 26 26 28 28 30 30 sts for back each sleeve 16 16 16 17 17 17 18 18 18 18 neck pm p 4 4 4 5 5 5 6 6 6 6 for sleeve back 36 36 36 38 38 38 40 40 42 42 pm p1 for front raglan section 3 row 2 rs kfb in first st sm kfb *k to 1 st before marker kfb sm kfb repeat from * 2 more times - 1 st joining fronts set-up increase d on fronts 2 sts increase d on sleeves and back step 1 using cable co technique co 14 14 row 3 ws p to end slipping markers as you 14 16 16 16 18 18 20 20 sts for your center reach them front you now have 25 25 25 27 27 27 29 29 31 31 sts on ln between front marker and row 4 rs k1 kfb sm kfb *k to 1 st before end of needle marker kfb sm kfb repeat from * 2 more times then k last st - 1 st increase d on fronts 2 sts increase d on sleeves step 2 break yarn leaving a long tail around and back 8-10 just to help with weaving in ends later row 5 ws p to end slipping markers as you step 3 sl the 25 25 25 27 27 27 29 29 31 reach them 31 sts on ln between needle tip and marker these are your left front sts from ln to rn total sts then sl marker as well each front 3 step 4 then sl 16 16 16 17 17 17 18 18 each sleeve 8 8 8 9 9 9 10 10 10 10 18 18 sleeve sts from ln to rn as well then back 28 28 28 30 30 30 32 32 34 34 remove next marker
